issue.title: Mesh is invisible, but I can see it as a collision. DAE model

content.raw:
I am using a custom mesh that I made in Blender.  It worked great in Gazebo 7, but isn't working since upgrading to Gazebo 9.  I can see the .stl collisions if I set the Model view to see collisions (and the quadcopter crashes into them if I force it to), but the .dae is invisible in the viewer.  But I don't see an error related to it while running gazebo --verbose.

Here is the world file (just in case):

```
#!html
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
<!--<include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
    </include>-->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <light type="directional" name="my_light" cast_shadows="true">
      <origin pose="0 0 30 0 0 0"/>
      <diffuse rgba=".9 .9 .9 1"/>
      <specular rgba=".1 .1 .1 1"/>
      <attenuation range="20"/>
      <direction xyz="0 0 -1"/>
    </light>
    <model name="my_mesh">
      <pose>0 0 0  0 0 0</pose>
      <static>true</static>
      <link name="body">
	<collision name="collision">
	  <geometry>
		  <mesh><uri>file:///usr/share/gazebo-7/worlds/uofu_labeless_aligned_truenorth.stl</uri></mesh>
	  </geometry>
        </collision>
	<visual name="visual">
	  <geometry>
		  <mesh>
			  <uri>file:///usr/share/gazebo-7/worlds/uofu_labeless_aligned_truenorth.dae</uri>
		  	  <scale>1.0 1.0 1.0</scale>
		  </mesh>
  	  </geometry>
	</visual>
      </link>
    </model>
    <model name="iris">
      <include>
        <uri>model://iris_with_standoffs_demo_9002</uri>
      </include>
      <pose>56 -25 8 0 0 0</pose>
    </model>
  </world>
</sdf>


```
content.html:
I am using a custom mesh that I made in Blender. It worked great in Gazebo 7, but isn't working since upgrading to Gazebo 9. I can see the .stl collisions if I set the Model view to see collisions (and the quadcopter crashes into them if I force it to), but the .dae is invisible in the viewer. But I don't see an error related to it while running gazebo --verbose.

Here is the world file (just in case):

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
<!--<include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
    </include>-->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <light type="directional" name="my_light" cast_shadows="true">
      <origin pose="0 0 30 0 0 0"/>
      <diffuse rgba=".9 .9 .9 1"/>
      <specular rgba=".1 .1 .1 1"/>
      <attenuation range="20"/>
      <direction xyz="0 0 -1"/>
    </light>
    <model name="my_mesh">
      <pose>0 0 0  0 0 0</pose>
      <static>true</static>
      <link name="body">
    <collision name="collision">
      <geometry>
          <mesh><uri>file:///usr/share/gazebo-7/worlds/uofu_labeless_aligned_truenorth.stl</uri></mesh>
      </geometry>
        </collision>
    <visual name="visual">
      <geometry>
          <mesh>
              <uri>file:///usr/share/gazebo-7/worlds/uofu_labeless_aligned_truenorth.dae</uri>
              <scale>1.0 1.0 1.0</scale>
          </mesh>
      </geometry>
    </visual>
      </link>
    </model>
    <model name="iris">
      <include>
        <uri>model://iris_with_standoffs_demo_9002</uri>
      </include>
      <pose>56 -25 8 0 0 0</pose>
    </model>
  </world>
</sdf>
